faq.question: How do you calculate your offer price?
faq.answer: We look at the recent sales of similar homes in your neighborhood (comps), the current condition of your property, and the cost of any needed repairs. Our goal is to provide a fair, data-driven offer that reflects the market value while accounting for the convenience of a fast, as-is sale.

faq.question: How fast can you close?
faq.answer: We can typically close in as little as 7 to 14 days, depending on your needs. Since we use private funds and don't rely on traditional bank financing, we can move much faster than a standard buyer. If you need more time, we can also schedule the closing for a date that works best for you.

faq.question: Do I need to make any repairs or clean the house?
faq.answer: Not at all. We buy houses in 'as-is' condition. You don't need to paint, repair the roof, or even clean out the closets. You can take what you want and leave the rest behindâ€”we'll handle everything from there.

faq.question: Are there any commissions or hidden fees?
faq.answer: No. When you sell to us, there are no real estate agent commissions (which typically save you 6%) and we usually cover all standard closing costs. The offer we give you is the amount you'll walk away with at the closing table.

faq.question: Are you wholesalers or direct buyers?
faq.answer: We are a local real estate investment firm. In some cases we buy and hold the property ourselves, and in others, we work with a network of partners to ensure you get the best possible solution for your situation. Our priority is making the process seamless for you.

faq.question: How does the process work?
faq.answer: It's simple: (1) We have a quick chat to learn about the property, (2) We do a brief walkthrough or review photos, (3) We present you with a fair written offer, and (4) We close at a local title company on your timeline. No pressure, no gimmicks.

faq.question: Is your offer guaranteed?
faq.answer: Once we've done our due diligence and signed a contract, we are committed to closing. We use reputable local title companies to ensure everything is handled professionally and securely.
